name: Lantern Beetle
movement: 30 ft. walking, 10 ft. climbing, 10 ft. flying
description: The Lantern Beetle is a tiny, bioluminescent creature with a horn. It emits bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
memorable: It continues to glow for 6 hours after death, making it a unique light source.
goals: Primarily serves to provide illumination in dark areas.
relations: Could be encountered with other small creatures in forested or dark environments.
environment: Commonly found in dark areas where its light can be useful.
strengths: Provides illumination in dark environments, aiding navigation.
weaknesses: Extremely low hit points and poor physical attributes limit combat effectiveness.
attacks: Horn melee attack with a +3 to hit, dealing 1 piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Illumination ability, shedding light in dark areas and lasting for hours after death.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 8, indicating low awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Very low Intelligence and Wisdom scores limit its interaction capabilities.
Capable of climbing and flying, albeit slowly.
Utilized as a whimsical creature in low-level encounters.
Provides amusing or mysterious interactions with adventurers.
Often seen in groups, enhancing its ecological role.
